explains: n. 废奴主义者；废除主义者

sentences.en: He was a national leader in the abolitionist movement.
sentences.cn: 他曾是废除主义者运动中的全国性领袖。

sentences.en: Instead, Southern slaveholders misconstrued abolitionist views of the 1830s as mainstream rather than marginal Northern public opinion, and castigated Northerners generally for opposing slavery.
sentences.cn: 相反，南方的奴隶主误认为9世纪30年代的废奴主义观点是主流，而不是北方边缘的公众意见，于是他们普遍谴责北方人反对奴隶制。

sentences.en: But the abolitionist trend seems inexorable.
sentences.cn: 但是，废除死刑的趋势看上去不可阻挡。
